Title: ASP.NET HTML5 Controls
Description:
DotM.Html5 is a library for ASP.NET in which html 5 controls are available for use. 
This control set contains new input type elements like 'email', 'number', etc. and new elements like 'section', 'nav', etc. introduced in HTML 5.

Version 1.0 of DotM.HTML5 contains elements for the following html5 elements:
article
aside
audio
canvas
datalist
details
figcaption
figure
footer
header
hgroup
input, color
input, date
input, datetime
input, datetimelocal
input, email
input, month
input, number
input, search
input, tel
input, text
input, time
input, url
input, week
keygen
meter
nav
output
progress
range
section
source
summary
time
track
video
